#op---#rs--#rt--#rd--#shft#funct
00100000001001000000000000110010 # ADDI $4, $0, 4    --> $4 = 4 (byte address of 2nd word)
00000000010001000010000000100000 # LW   $2, 0($4)    --> $2 = 70997
00100000011000011111111100101101 # ADD  $9, $2, $3   --> $9 = 70986
10101111111010010000000000001100 # SW   $9, 0(12)    --> mem[3] = 70986
11111101011101000001000001001010 # EOP (altered)
# Data goes below
01010101010101010101010101010101 #
00000000000000010001010101010101 #
